tuv.seg: At what age can I?
Cén aois is féidir liom?
Start second level education
Oideachas dara leibhéal a thosú
• Age 12 on 1st of January in the first school year of attendance
• Aois 12 ar an 1 Eanáir sa chéad bhliain scoile
• Age 16 or on completion of 3 years post-primary education, whichever is the later
• Aois 16 nó ar chríochnú 3 bliana oideachais iarbhunscoile, cibé acu is déanaí
• Age 14 – up to 7 hours per day (35 hours per week) during school holidays only
• Aois 14 – suas le 7 n-uaire in aghaidh an lae (35 uair in aghaidh na seachtaine) le linn laethanta saoire ón scoil amháin
• Age 15 – up to 8 hours per week during term-time and up to 7 hours per day (35 hours per week) during school holidays
• Aois 15 – suas le 8 n-uaire le linn an téarma agus suas le 7 n-uaire in aghaidh an lae (35 uair in aghaidh na seachtaine) i rith laethanta saoire ón scoil
• Age 16 – up to 8 hours per day (40 hours per week)
• Aois 16 – suas le 8 n-uaire in aghaidh an lae (40 uair in aghaidh na seachtaine)
Get the national minimum wage
Íosphá náisiúnta a fháil
• Age 14 – 70% of minimum wage
• Aois 14 – 70% den íosphá
• Age 18 – 80% of minimum wage
• Aois 18 – 80% den íosphá
• Age 19 – 90% if in second year of employment after reaching age 18
• Aois 19 – 90% sa dara bliain fostaíochta tar éis aois 18 a bhaint amach
• Age 20 – 100% if in third year of employment after reaching age 18
• Aois 20 – 100% sa tríú bliain fostaíochta tar éis aois 18 a bhaint amach
• Age 16 – SOLAS apprentice
• Aois 16 – Printíseacht SOLAS
• Age 18 – Army or Air Corps apprentice
• Aois 18 – Printíseach san Arm nó san Aerchór
Join the Army or Garda Síochána
A bheith mar bhall den Arm nó den Gharda Síochána
• Age 18 – Army, Air Corps or Naval Service
• Aois 18 – Arm, Aerchór nó an tSeirbhís Chabhlaigh
• Age 18 – Garda Síochána
• Aois 18 – An Garda Síochána
• No legal minimum age
• Níl aon íos-aois dhlíthiúil
• Age 12 – boat with an engine over 3.75kW (5hp)
• Aois 12 – bád le hinneall níos mó ná 3.7kW (5hp)
• Age 16 – motorcycle up to 11kW and up to 125cc, moped with a maximum speed of 45kph, work vehicle such as a tractor or JCB, jet ski or motor boat capable of 17 knots or more
• Aois 16 – gluaisrothar suas le 11kW agus suas le 125cc, móipéid le luas uasta de 45kph, feithicil oibre cosúil le tarracóir nó JCB, scaird sciála nó mótair bád in ann 17 muirmhíle nó níos mó
• Age 17 – vehicle with seats for up to 8 passenger and maximum weight of 3,500kg
• Aois 17 – feithiclí le suíocháin do suas le 8 paisinéirí agus uas-mheáchan 3,500kg
• Age 18 – motorcycle up to 35kW, goods vehicle up to 7,500kg
• Aois 18 – gluaisrothar suas le 35kW, feithiclí earraí suas le 7,500kg
• Age 21 – goods vehicle, bus with accommodation for up to 16 passengers
• Aois 21 – feithiclí earraí, bus le cóiríocht do suas le 16 paisinéir
• Age 0 – three-year passport
• Aois 0 – pas trí bliana
• Age 3 – five-year passport
• Aois 3 – pas cúig bliana
• Age 18 – ten-year passport
• Aois 18 – pas deich mbliana
Book a holiday or flight
Saoire nó eitilt a chur in áirithint
• Age 16 – in general
• Aois 16 - go ginearálta
Apply for a National Age Card
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar Aoischárta Náisiúnta
• Age 18 – if under 18 you must be accompanied by a parent in an off-licence
• Aois 18 – caithfidh daoine faoi 18 a bheith faoi thionlacan tuismitheora i siopa eischeadúnais
You may only remain on a licensed premises up to 9pm (10pm from May-September) if accompanied by a parent
Ní féidir fanacht in áitreabh ceadúnaithe ach suas go dtí 9in (10in ó Bhealtaine go Meán Fómhair) ach amháin faoi thionlacan tuismitheora
If aged between 15-17 years you may remain on the premises after 9pm when attending a private function at which a substantial meal is being served
Má bhíonn tú 15-17 bliana d’aois, féadfaidh tú fanacht ar an áitreabh tar éis 9in nuair a bhíonn tú ag freastal ar ócáid phríobháideach ag a bhfuil béile suntasach ar fáil
• Age 18 – if you are under 18 you can drink alcohol in a private residence, providing you have parental consent
• Aois 18 – féadfaidh daoine faoi 18 alcól a ól i dteach príobháideach le toiliú tuismitheora
• Age 16 – engage in gaming at an amusement hall or funfair
• Aois 16 – a bheith i mbun cearrbhachais i halla siamsaíochta nó ag aonach siamsaíochta
• Age 18 – enter a bookies, buy a lotto ticket
• Aois 18 – dul isteach i siopa geallghlacadóra, ticéad lató a cheannach
• Age 16 – you must have a dog licence to keep a dog
• Aois 16 – caithfidh ceadúnas madra a bheith agat chun madra a choinneáil
